title: Love
overview: Intersecting love stories of two people, Young Ji and In Ha are explored in the drama Love. Young Ji is a widow in her mid-thirties. After Young Ji's husband dies, her former boyfriend Joon Sup divorced his wife and becomes close to Young Ji again. It almost seems natural that they would get married. In Ha, a young man in his twenties, immediately falls in love with Young Ji during a chance meeting. Young Ji also is attracted to In Ha's pure loving heart, but knows Joon Sup is the "right" choice. However life and love rarely goes the way we want it.
